genresAdvancedInfo.name: sepedi pop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Sepedi pop is a popular music genre in South Africa that blends traditional Sepedi music with modern pop and hip-hop influences. The music often features catchy melodies and upbeat rhythms, with lyrics that touch on themes of love, relationships, and social issues. Sepedi pop artists often incorporate traditional instruments like the marimba and the djembe into their music, giving it a unique and distinctly African sound.
